property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, each player reveals and banishes 2 cards from the top of their deck. When a card is banished this way, if there are at least 20 cards banished this way, dismiss each other Friend, Resource, and Troublemaker, each player puts each of their Friends and Troublemakers banished this way into play, and banish this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may move up to two of your characters at home. If you do, exhaust those characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may exhaust an opposing character at each Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may put a Resource from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each frightened Friend. Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. When this card becomes Cutie Marked, you may frighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, if you have a Lyra, you may pay 1AT to ready one of your characters here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Pay 2AT to move this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this or another Friend is frightened, you may put a 1 [Loyalty] Pegasus Friend token with Swift into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has Competitive 1 for each of your characters here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. When this card becomes Cutie Marked, you may challenge a Troublemaker here with your characters here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. While this card is Cutie Marked, it has +1 power and Swift.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. While this card is Cutie Marked, it has Competitive 2. When one of your Friends becomes Cutie Marked, you may move one of your characters to that Friend's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: While with another one of your [Loyalty] Friends, this card has Competitive 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Remove a +1 power counter from this card to move this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. Your Cutie Marked Friends have +1 power. While this card is Cutie Marked, it has Diligent 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. While this card is Cutie Marked, it has +1 power and Diligent 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your token Friends can't be frightened.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Exhaust this card and banish a card from your discard pile to give one of your characters Stubborn until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put the top two cards of your deck into your discard pile. Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. While this card is Cutie Marked, it has +1 power for each card type among cards in your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish a card from your discard pile to give this card +1 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: While with another one of your [Honesty] Friends, this card has Stubborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may remove a counter from a ready card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hasty When this card enters play, you may uncover a Troublemaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Friends becomes Cutie Marked, you may draw a card. Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. While this card is Cutie Marked, your maximum hand size is increased by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: While with another one of your [Laughter] Friends, this card has Eccentric 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to search your deck for a Bon Bon card and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has Eccentric X, where X is this card's power. Main Phase: Retire a Friend to put a +1 power counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. When this card becomes Cutie Marked, dismiss an opposing Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. While this card is Cutie Marked, it has +1 power and Eccentric 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Friends becomes Cutie Marked, you may exhaust this card to gain 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: While with another one of your [Magic] Friends, this card has Meticulous 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT and exhaust this card to put a 2 [Magic] Figment Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prepared Your Troublemakers here have "Immediate: During a faceoff, pay 1AT to give this card +2 power until the end of the faceoff.".

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Troublemakers have +2 power. Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. When this card becomes Cutie Marked, you may put a Troublemaker from your hand into play face-up.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. While this card is Cutie Marked, it has +1 power and Meticulous 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent confronts this card's Problem, you may exhaust this card to gain 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card is not Cutie Marked, it can't contribute its power to confronting Problems. Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may remove a +1 power counter from each of any number of other characters and put them on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each of your Cutie Marked Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT and retire this card to gain control of an opposing Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: While with another one of your [Generosity] Friends, this card has Prepared.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. While this card is Cutie Marked, it has +1 power and Showy 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, if there are no opposing characters at this card's Problem, you may put a 1 [Generosity] Unicorn Friend token with Prepared into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. When this card becomes Cutie Marked, you may put a Friend from your discard pile into your hand. When one of your Friends becomes Cutie Marked, you may pay 2AT to score a point. If you have Scootaloo, Forever a Crusader and Apple Bloom, Forever a Crusader, you may pay 0 AT? to score a point instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: While with another one of your [Kindness] Friends, this card has Persistent.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put an opposing Troublemaker into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. While this card is Cutie Marked, it has +1 power and Calming 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Retire this card to dismiss an opposing Resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card can't contribute its power to faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opposing Friends with 3 or more printed power have -1 power during your turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may move one of your Critters to this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent plays a Resource, you may put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Critter Friends do not count against your home limit. Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. When this card becomes Cutie Marked, put 2 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend tokens into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card has at least 3 power, it has Swift. While this card has at least 4 power, it has Stubborn. While this card has at least 5 power, it has Competitive 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may frighten or unfrighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a Problem faceoff involving this card by at least 5 power, an opponent discards a random card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play or move this card to a Problem, another character there gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hasty During a faceoff, you may play this card from your discard pile as if it were in your hand. If you do, banish this card at the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opposing Friend enters play here, you may pay 1AT to frighten it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Exhaust this card to gain 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to draw the bottom card of your deck, then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent starts a faceoff here, you may put a +1 power counter on each of up to 2 of your characters here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Retire a Friend to choose a Troublemaker here. That Troublemaker does not prevent you from confronting its Problem until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When another one of your Friends enters play here, that Friend and this card get +1 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, each player retires a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are no opposing characters at this card's Problem, you pay 1AT less to play Events, to a minimum of 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move this card to a Problem, you may move an opposing character to this card's Problem. Opposing characters here can't be moved unless their controller pays 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play at a Problem, move each opposing character and each Troublemaker to this card's Problem. Opposing characters here have -1 power during faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: As this card enters play, name a color. This card is that color. At the start of your turn, choose a color. This card loses its colors and becomes that color.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play. Immediate: Move up to 3 of your Critter Friends from home to a Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Put a 2 [Magic] Figment Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, put a +1 power counter on one of your Friends. Immediate: Put two +1 power counters on one of your Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: A player puts the top 2 cards of their deck into their discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, move one of your characters to a Problem. Immediate: Move one of your characters to each Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Dismiss a Friend with 3 or more power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, move an opposing character. Immediate: Move an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish all cards in a discard pile, then draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Look at the top 2 cards of a Problem deck and put them on the top or bottom of that deck in any order, put 2 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend tokens into play, or each player retires a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Put a 3 [Honesty] Rock Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Put a Friend from your discard pile into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Troublemakers don't prevent you from confronting Problems until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Flip an additional card during faceoffs until the start of your next turn, move an opposing character, or name a card type and an opponent reveals their hand and discards a card with that type.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Search your deck for a Troublemaker, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: A Friend involved in a faceoff gets +3 power and Diligent 3 until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Put an opposing Friend with 2 or less power on top of its owner's deck, double the power of one of your Troublemakers until the start of your next turn, or put an Event from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Frighten an opposing Friend, opponents can't play Events this turn, or if you have fewer points than an opponent score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Put a Friend or Resource on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Draw 3 cards then discard 3 cards, challenge an opposing Troublemaker with one of your characters, or move your Mane Character and it gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on one of your Troublemakers. That Troublemaker is Epic and has +3 power. Main Phase: Pay 1AT to move that Troublemaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: At the end of a faceoff while this card is flipped, put this card into play attached to one of your Friends. Play on a Friend That Friend has +1 power for each Accessory attached to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hasty Play on one of your Friends. When this card enters play, move that Friend. That friend has +3 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend That Friend has +3 power and Prepared.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, an opponent retires a Friend involved in the faceoff. Play to your home. When this card enters play, draw a card. At the start of a faceoff, you may put this card on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. At the end of your turn, put a 3 [Honesty] Rock Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play at each Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may put a Friend from an opponent's discard pile into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may replace another Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: Pay 1AT and exhaust this card to look at the top card of your deck and choose a number. An opponent guesses whether that card's power matches the chosen number and you reveal that card. If that opponent guesses correctly, banish that card. Otherwise, gain 3AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put a Troublemaker from your hand into play faceup.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Immediate: Exhaust this card and remove a +1 power counter from one of your cards to gain 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, choose a Problem. You may put a +1 power counter on each of your Friends there.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may frighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Problem. Immediate: Pay 2AT and exhaust this card to dismiss an opposing Friend here with 3 or more power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: Exhaust this card to pay 1AT less to play your next card this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Troublemaker phase, you may remove a counter from a ready card.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Troublemaker phase, exhaust one of your characters at random to gain 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Troublemaker phase, put a +1 power counter on this card. When you put a +1 power counter on this card, if it has exactly 3 +1 power counters on it, frighten all Friends here. While this card has at least 3 +1 power counters on it, it is Epic.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, dismiss a frightened Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a faceoff involving this card, you may gain control of an opposing Friend until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Starting Problem At the start of your first turn, if you did not play first, gain 1AT. (You choose your Starting Problem before determining who plays first.).

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust your Mane Character to put a 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your opponent's turn, if no Problems were confronted this turn, score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Friends here have 2 power and can't gain or lose power.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your Main Phase, you may challenge an opposing Troublemaker here with all of your characters here.

property.name: Text
property.value: During Troublemaker faceoffs here, flip an additional card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust your Mane Character to gain 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: Friends with 3 or more power can't be played here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, name a card. An opponent reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you start a faceoff here, flip an additional card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may move your Mane Character to this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Troublemakers have +1 power for each of your characters here.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may pay 1AT less to play the first Friend you play to this Problem each turn, to a minimum of 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem becomes solved, frighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent starts a faceoff here, gain 2AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, choose a color at the start of your next turn. Your Mane Character has the chosen color.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem becomes solved, you may banish a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this side of the card is turned face-up for the first time each game, there is an additional Ready Phase before your next End Phase. (During the Ready Phase, you ready your cards, gain actions, and draw a card.).

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. While this card is Cutie Marked, it has "During faceoffs involving this card, flip an additional card.".

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may look at the top card of a Problem deck and put it on the top or bottom of that deck. Main Phase: Pay 2AT to Cutie Mark this card. When this card becomes Cutie marked, you may replace its Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Critters here have +1 power. At the end of your turn, put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may move an opposing Troublemaker. If you do, you may challenge that Troublemaker with all your characters at its Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one of your Friends here with 1 printed power would be sent home, send it to another Problem instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prepared Immediate: Exhaust this card to choose an Event in your discard pile. Until the end of the turn, you may play that Event as though it were in your hand. If you do and it would enter your discard pile, banish it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Put 7 1 [Loyalty] Pegasus Friend tokens with Swift into play. At the end of the turn, banish them.
